description: Kirino`s novel is flying off the shelves, and even getting an anime! But when Kirino dreams of getting her favorite stars for staff, and every last detail being perfect, the anime producers` goal is more mundane: Making money.

titles.title: Le roman de ma petite sœur ne peut pas devenir un anime
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Anime-ka na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Could Get an Anime
俺の妹がこんなにアニメ化なわけがない
